name: The Wheels On The Bus - Sing Along Nursery Rhyme
name_original: The Wheels On The Bus - Sing Along Nursery Rhyme
description:
**************FREE FOR LIMITED TIME ONLY*******************( REGULAR PRICE 2.99$)!
**************FREE FOR LIMITED TIME ONLY******************* ( REGULAR PRICE 2.99$)!
-> 4 fabulous games including the full interactive sing along "The wheels on the bus"
-> Adorable HD graphics and sounds
-> Top selling education app worldwide

The perfect game for little kids that love to sing! Wheels on the bus is a beautiful and fun, sing along and interactive counting game bundle based on the popular rhyme we all know and love.
Toddlers, preschool and kindergarten kids will love this app- All in one bundle fun for 2-6 year old kids. Come and enjoy the classic song with your little ones
A highly engaging and beautiful graphic games pack that will keep your kids entertained for hours. It is the perfect game for little kids that love to sing!
This so cute, HD graphics, activity center pack includes 4 different fun learning activities to play with:

** SING ALONG with wheels on the bus – The classic song comes alive with beautiful animation and funny interactions. Tap on different items and interact with the song
** JOIN THE DOTS with wheels on the bus – Join dots, explore and learn to count with amazing illustrations to color later on
** JIGSAW PUZZLES with wheels on the bus - High quality, colorful and fabulous jigsaw puzzles to help practice fine motor skills and shape recognition.
** MEMORY MATCHING GAME wheels on the bus -Match the pairs to improve visual memory. Complete all pairs to move to the next level.

Wheels on the bus activity bundle for toddlers, preschool and kindergarten kids is a colorful, fun educational experience. Easy for little fingers to play.

****************************************

Privacy disclosure:

• Does not collect or share any location and/or personal data
• Does not contain any ads
• Does not contain In-App Purchases
• Does not contain Social Network Integration
• Does not contain web browser links
• The app contains “more apps” external links on a separate page accessible through a "press and hold" button.
